meanings.sent1: The inviter sent out the party invitations.
meanings.sent2: My friend is always the inviter for our group outings.
meanings.sent3: The inviter made sure everyone felt welcome at the event.
meanings.sent4: She was the inviter of joy and laughter wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The inviter's warm smile made everyone feel included.

meanings.definition: To ask someone to go somewhere or do something.
meanings.sent1: I will inviter my friend to join us for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She decided to inviter her classmates to the study group.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to inviter the dog to play chase around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The music invitered everyone to the dance floor with its lively beat.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies invitered me into the kitchen.
